long_desc.thetext:
Ansible version 1.6.7 fixes 2 security issues.
More details could be found here:
http://www.mail-archive.com/ansible-project@googlegroups.com/msg07265.html
https://bugs.gentoo.org/show_bug.cgi?id=517770

This is the upstream commit with the fix:
https://github.com/ansible/ansible/commit/62a1295a3e08cb6c3e9f1b2a1e6e5dcaeab32527

Created ansible tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: epel-all [bug 1122061]
Affects: fedora-all [bug 1122062]

Note that 1.6.7 is currently in Fedora/EPEL testing:

https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/search/ansible-1.6.7
ansible-1.6.10-1.fc19 has been pushed to the Fedora 19 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
ansible-1.6.10-1.fc20 has been pushed to the Fedora 20 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
ansible-1.7-1.el6 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

Ansible version 1.6.7 fixes 2 security issues.
More details could be found here:
http://www.mail-archive.com/ansible-project@googlegroups.com/msg07265.html
https://bugs.gentoo.org/show_bug.cgi?id=517770

This is the upstream commit with the fix:
https://github.com/ansible/ansible/commit/62a1295a3e08cb6c3e9f1b2a1e6e5dcaeab32527

Created ansible tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: epel-all [bug 1122061]
Affects: fedora-all [bug 1122062]

Note that 1.6.7 is currently in Fedora/EPEL testing:

https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/search/ansible-1.6.7
ansible-1.6.10-1.fc19 has been pushed to the Fedora 19 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
ansible-1.6.10-1.fc20 has been pushed to the Fedora 20 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
ansible-1.7-1.el6 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

This is an automatically created tracking bug!  It was created to ensure
that one or more security vulnerabilities are fixed in affected versions
of Fedora EPEL.

For comments that are specific to the vulnerability please use bugs filed
against the "Security Response" product referenced in the "Blocks" field.

For more information see:
http://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Security/TrackingBugs

When creating a Bodhi update request, use the bodhi submission link noted
in the next comment(s).  This will include the bug IDs of this tracking
bug as well as the relevant top-level CVE bugs.

Please also mention the CVE IDs being fixed in the RPM changelog and the
Bodhi notes field when available.

NOTE: this issue affects multiple supported versions of Fedora EPEL. While
only one tracking bug has been filed, please correct all affected versions
at the same time.  If you need to fix the versions independent of each
other, you may clone this bug as appropriate.

[bug automatically created by: add-tracking-bugs]

Use the following update submission link to create the Bodhi request for
this issue as it contains the top-level parent bug(s) as well as this
tracking bug.  This will ensure that all associated bugs get updated when
new packages are pushed to stable.

IMPORTANT: ensure that the "Close bugs when update is stable" option
remains checked.

Bodhi update submission link:
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/new/?type_=security&bugs=1122060,1122061

ansible-1.6.8-1.fc20 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 20.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/ansible-1.6.8-1.fc20

ansible-1.6.8-1.fc19 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 19.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/ansible-1.6.8-1.fc19

ansible-1.6.8-1.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/ansible-1.6.8-1.el6

Package ansible-1.6.8-1.fc20:
* should fix your issue,
* was pushed to the Fedora 20 testing repository,
* should be available at your local mirror within two days.
Update it with:
# su -c 'yum update --enablerepo=updates-testing ansible-1.6.8-1.fc20'
as soon as you are able to.
Please go to the following url:
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2014-8698/ansible-1.6.8-1.fc20
then log in and leave karma (feedback).

comments.text: This update has been submitted for testing by kevin.
This update is currently being pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 testing updates repository.
This update has been pushed to testing
This update has been obsoleted by https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/ansible-1.6.9-1.el6

notes:
Update to 1.6.8 with fixes for shell quoting from previous release.
Update to 1.6.7 Fixes CVE-2014-4966 and CVE-2014-4967
title: ansible-1.6.8-1.el6
